item.title: Sunday data/statistics link roundup (8/12/12)
item.description: An interesting blog post about the top N reasons to do a Ph.D. in bioinformatics or computational biology. A couple of things that I find interesting and could actually be said of any program in biostatistics as well are: computing is the key skill of the 21st century and computational skills are highly transferrable. Via Andrew J.Â Here is an interesting auto-complete map of the United States where the prompt was, “Why is [state] so”.
